edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge

Interface ZKPOKVerifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ZKVerifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZKPOKFiatShamirFromSigmaVerifier, ZKPOKFromSigmaCmtPedersenVerifier

    public interface ZKPOKVerifier
extends ZKVerifier
    This interface is a general interface that simulates the verifier side of the Zero Knowledge proof of knowledge.

    Every class that implements it is signed as ZKPOK verifier.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge.ZKVerifier

        verify
